review: This was the best thing I've ever returned.  I've been using a dedicated computer to watch online content on my TV.  My audio receiver does not process audio over HDMI.  I needed a device with a digital audio output.  The full size Fire has a digital optical.  It plays Amazon Prime content wonderfully!  Video begins streaming immediately.  Using the Fire, you can fast forward (at 3 speeds) and jump forward or back by 10 seconds.  Nice to have DVR functions!Cons:I hoped to watch other content using the Fire.  It says it plays Showtime anytime, but only if you have one of the few providers they allow.  I hoped I'd be able to watch fox.com abc.com nbc.com and cbs.com.  I knew I'd need to add an app to have a browser.  I found tutorials online, and it was easy enough to do.  Unfortunately the browser is detected as a handheld browser.  ABC.com wanted me to install the ABCGO app, and wouldn't play shows.  If I had more HDMI inputs on my receiver, I'd keep the fire.  If I didn't need the digital optical output, I'd buy one of the cheaper units.The Fire goes back.  I guess I'll get a better computer to run as my stand alone computer.  The current one barely handles streaming HD video content.
